TopicTitle: Anyone have a CFG file for pure Liquid Fuel Tanks?

Articles.Content:
Anyone out there who has bothered making an mm.cfg file for copied tanks but with all the oxidizer removed and equal amount of that added in liquid fuel?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-10T17:39:49Z" title="06/10/2015 05:39  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 10, 2015</time> by Sokar408**

I think the LiquidTanks mod is doing exactly that:

[LiquidTanks](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121264-1-0-2-LiquidTanks-LF-only-tanks-for-nuclear-engines)
